subject: Run a block of sql commands using 'here document'
body:
Hi,

I know that using 'Here Documents', we can output multiple lines. But is it
possible to run a couple of commands?

$s = qx [sqlplus user/paswd\@schema <<ENDOFSQL
select 2 from DUAL;
exit
ENDOFSQL];

Any ideas on how to make the above code work??
(I do not want to install DBI module and then invoke the sql commands)

Thanks in advance!!!

Sailaja
